targets.rawSql:
SET TimeZone = '$Timezone';

SELECT
  alert__last_update AS "time"
FROM v_operational_info

SET TimeZone = '$Timezone';

WITH vars AS(
SELECT
(
/* var: v_offset */
(CASE WHEN ($p_offset_selected_duration=true)
  THEN ($__timeTo()::timestamptz - $__timeFrom()::timestamptz)::interval
  ELSE interval '0'
  END)
  + make_interval(years => $p_offset_years, months => $p_offset_months, weeks => $p_offset_weeks, days => $p_offset_days)) as v_offset

)

SELECT 'Selected' As "Query Periods", (($__timeFrom())::timestamptz) as "TIME-FROM", (($__timeTo())::timestamptz) as "TIME-TO"

union all

SELECT 'Previous' As "Query Periods",(($__timeFrom())::timestamptz - v_offset) as "TIME-FROM", (($__timeTo())::timestamptz - v_offset) "TIME-TO"
From vars

SET TimeZone = '$Timezone';

SELECT
  id AS "Alert ID", managed_object_name AS "Managed Object", host_address AS "IP Address", array_to_string(misuse_types || protocols, ',') AS "Vectors", importance_txt AS "Severity", direction AS "Direction", start_time as "time", EXTRACT(epoch FROM duration::interval) as "Duration", alert_type_txt AS "Alert Type", 
  impact_bps AS "bps", impact_pps AS "pps", INITCAP(mitigated::text) as "Mitigated"
FROM v_alert
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) and impact_bps > 0 and impact_pps > 0
  AND
  /* SharedFilter - START v20220915 */
  managed_object_name IN ($Managed_Object) AND
  NOT managed_object_name = Any(ARRAY[$Managed_Object_exclude]::text[]) AND
  importance_txt IN ($Severity_Level) AND
  alert_type_txt IN ($Alert_Type) AND
  direction IN ($Direction) AND
  impact_bps >= (coalesce(nullif('$min_impact_gbps', ''), '0')::double precision * 1000 * 1000 * 1000) AND
  INITCAP(mitigated::text) IN ($Mitigated) AND
  ARRAY[$Mitigation_Type] && mitigation_types AND
  INITCAP(automitigation::text) IN ($Automitigation)
  /* SharedFilter - END */

ORDER BY "bps" desc

SET TimeZone = '$Timezone';

SELECT
  max(impact_bps) AS "bps",
  max(impact_pps) AS "pps"
FROM v_alert
WHERE
  start_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND
  /* SharedFilter - START v20220915 */
  managed_object_name IN ($Managed_Object) AND
  NOT managed_object_name = Any(ARRAY[$Managed_Object_exclude]::text[]) AND
  importance_txt IN ($Severity_Level) AND
  alert_type_txt IN ($Alert_Type) AND
  direction IN ($Direction) AND
  impact_bps >= (coalesce(nullif('$min_impact_gbps', ''), '0')::double precision * 1000 * 1000 * 1000) AND
  INITCAP(mitigated::text) IN ($Mitigated) AND
  ARRAY[$Mitigation_Type] && mitigation_types AND
  INITCAP(automitigation::text) IN ($Automitigation)
  /* SharedFilter - END */

SET TimeZone = '$Timezone';

(
/* var: v_offset */

SET2 as (

FROM v_alert, vars

  + make_interval(years => $p_offset_years, months => $p_offset_months, weeks => $p_offset_weeks, days => $p_offset_days)) as v_offset

),
alert_count AS (
SELECT
  EXTRACT(epoch FROM avg(duration) FILTER (WHERE importance_txt = 'Low' OR NULL)) AS "Low",
  EXTRACT(epoch FROM avg(duration) FILTER (WHERE importance_txt = 'Medium' OR NULL)) AS "Medium",
  EXTRACT(epoch FROM avg(duration) FILTER (WHERE importance_txt = 'High' OR NULL)) AS "High",
  EXTRACT(epoch FROM avg(duration)) as "Any"
FROM v_alert
WHERE
  start_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND
  /* SharedFilter - START v20220915 */
  managed_object_name IN ($Managed_Object) AND
  NOT managed_object_name = Any(ARRAY[$Managed_Object_exclude]::text[]) AND
  importance_txt IN ($Severity_Level) AND
  alert_type_txt IN ($Alert_Type) AND
  direction IN ($Direction) AND
  impact_bps >= (coalesce(nullif('$min_impact_gbps', ''), '0')::double precision * 1000 * 1000 * 1000) AND
  INITCAP(mitigated::text) IN ($Mitigated) AND
  ARRAY[$Mitigation_Type] && mitigation_types AND
  INITCAP(automitigation::text) IN ($Automitigation)
  /* SharedFilter - END */

),
alert_count_prev AS (
SELECT
  EXTRACT(epoch FROM avg(duration) FILTER (WHERE importance_txt = 'Low' OR NULL)) AS "Low_prev",
  EXTRACT(epoch FROM avg(duration) FILTER (WHERE importance_txt = 'Medium' OR NULL)) AS "Medium_prev",
  EXTRACT(epoch FROM avg(duration) FILTER (WHERE importance_txt = 'High' OR NULL)) AS "High_prev",
  EXTRACT(epoch FROM avg(duration)) as "Any_prev"
FROM v_alert,vars
WHERE
  start_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom()::timestamptz - v_offset
  AND
  $__timeTo()::timestamptz - v_offset
  AND
  /* SharedFilter - START v20220915 */
  managed_object_name IN ($Managed_Object) AND
  NOT managed_object_name = Any(ARRAY[$Managed_Object_exclude]::text[]) AND
  importance_txt IN ($Severity_Level) AND
  alert_type_txt IN ($Alert_Type) AND
  direction IN ($Direction) AND
  impact_bps >= (coalesce(nullif('$min_impact_gbps', ''), '0')::double precision * 1000 * 1000 * 1000) AND
  INITCAP(mitigated::text) IN ($Mitigated) AND
  ARRAY[$Mitigation_Type] && mitigation_types AND
  INITCAP(automitigation::text) IN ($Automitigation)
  /* SharedFilter - END */

)

select "High", "Medium", "Low", "Any", COALESCE((("High"::float/NULLIF("High_prev",0))*100), 0)::int as "high%", COALESCE((("Medium"::float/NULLIF("Medium_prev",0))*100), 0)::int as "medium%", COALESCE((("Low"::float/NULLIF("Low_prev",0))*100), 0)::int as "low%", COALESCE((("Any"::float/NULLIF("Any_prev",0))*100), 0)::int as "any%", "High_prev", "Medium_prev", "Low_prev", "Any_prev" from alert_count, alert_count_prev

panels.title: TREND: Average Alert Duration per Security Level [F03]

targets.rawSql:
SET TimeZone = '$Timezone';


SELECT
  date_trunc('$AggregationPeriod', start_time AT TIME ZONE ('$Timezone')::text)::timestamptz AS "time",
  EXTRACT(epoch FROM avg(duration) FILTER (WHERE importance_txt = 'Low' OR NULL)) AS "Low",
  EXTRACT(epoch FROM avg(duration) FILTER (WHERE importance_txt = 'Medium' OR NULL)) AS "Medium",
  EXTRACT(epoch FROM avg(duration) FILTER (WHERE importance_txt = 'High' OR NULL)) AS "High"
FROM v_alert
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND
  /* SharedFilter - START v20220915 */
  managed_object_name IN ($Managed_Object) AND
  NOT managed_object_name = Any(ARRAY[$Managed_Object_exclude]::text[]) AND
  importance_txt IN ($Severity_Level) AND
  alert_type_txt IN ($Alert_Type) AND
  direction IN ($Direction) AND
  impact_bps >= (coalesce(nullif('$min_impact_gbps', ''), '0')::double precision * 1000 * 1000 * 1000) AND
  INITCAP(mitigated::text) IN ($Mitigated) AND
  ARRAY[$Mitigation_Type] && mitigation_types AND
  INITCAP(automitigation::text) IN ($Automitigation)
  /* SharedFilter - END */

GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SET TimeZone = '$Timezone';

SELECT
  id AS "Alert ID", managed_object_name AS "Managed Object", importance_txt AS "Severity", start_time as "time", 
  impact_bps AS "bps", impact_pps AS "pps", INITCAP(mitigated::text) as "Mitigated", array_to_string(mitigation_types, ',') as "MitigationTypes", INITCAP(automitigation::text) AS "Automitigation",
  r_drop_bps_max_tms_and_flowspec_and_blackhole as "ANY bps max drop",  r_drop_pps_max_tms_and_flowspec_and_blackhole as "ANY pps max drop",
  r_drop_bytes_tms_and_flowspec_and_blackhole as "ANY bytes drop",  r_drop_packets_tms_and_flowspec_and_blackhole as "ANY packets drop",

  r_drop_bps_max_tms as "TMS bps max drop",  r_drop_pps_max_tms as "TMS pps max drop",
  r_drop_bytes_tms as "TMS bytes drop",  r_drop_packets_tms as "TMS packets drop",

  r_drop_bps_max_flowspec as "FS bps max drop",  r_drop_pps_max_flowspec as "FS pps max drop",
  r_drop_bytes_flowspec as "FS bytes drop",  r_drop_packets_flowspec as "FS packets drop",
  
  r_drop_bps_max_blackhole as "BH bps max drop",  r_drop_pps_max_blackhole as "BH pps max drop",
  r_drop_bytes_blackhole as "BH bytes drop",  r_drop_packets_blackhole as "BH packets drop"

FROM v_alert
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time) and impact_bps > 0 and impact_pps > 0
  AND
  /* SharedFilter - START v20220915 */
  managed_object_name IN ($Managed_Object) AND
  NOT managed_object_name = Any(ARRAY[$Managed_Object_exclude]::text[]) AND
  importance_txt IN ($Severity_Level) AND
  alert_type_txt IN ($Alert_Type) AND
  direction IN ($Direction) AND
  impact_bps >= (coalesce(nullif('$min_impact_gbps', ''), '0')::double precision * 1000 * 1000 * 1000) AND
  INITCAP(mitigated::text) IN ($Mitigated) AND
  ARRAY[$Mitigation_Type] && mitigation_types AND
  INITCAP(automitigation::text) IN ($Automitigation)
  /* SharedFilter - END */

ORDER BY "bps" desc

SET TimeZone = '$Timezone';

SELECT

  sum(r_drop_bytes_flowspec) AS "Flowspec Bytes",
  sum(r_drop_packets_flowspec) AS "Flowspec Packets",
  sum(r_drop_bytes_blackhole) AS "Blackhole Bytes",
  sum(r_drop_packets_blackhole) AS "Blackhole Packets"
FROM v_alert
WHERE
  start_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND
  /* SharedFilter - START v20220915 */
  managed_object_name IN ($Managed_Object) AND
  NOT managed_object_name = Any(ARRAY[$Managed_Object_exclude]::text[]) AND
  importance_txt IN ($Severity_Level) AND
  alert_type_txt IN ($Alert_Type) AND
  direction IN ($Direction) AND
  impact_bps >= (coalesce(nullif('$min_impact_gbps', ''), '0')::double precision * 1000 * 1000 * 1000) AND
  INITCAP(mitigated::text) IN ($Mitigated) AND
  ARRAY[$Mitigation_Type] && mitigation_types AND
  INITCAP(automitigation::text) IN ($Automitigation)
  /* SharedFilter - END */
),
SET2 AS (
SELECT
  sum(r_drop_bytes_tms_and_flowspec_and_blackhole) AS "ANY Bytes (prev)",
  sum(r_drop_packets_tms_and_flowspec_and_blackhole) AS "ANY Packets (prev)",
  sum(r_drop_bytes_tms) AS "TMS Bytes (prev)",
  sum(r_drop_packets_tms) AS "TMS Packets (prev)",
  sum(r_drop_bytes_flowspec) AS "Flowspec Bytes (prev)",
  sum(r_drop_packets_flowspec) AS "Flowspec Packets (prev)",
  sum(r_drop_bytes_blackhole) AS "Blackhole Bytes (prev)",
  sum(r_drop_packets_blackhole) AS "Blackhole Packets (prev)"
FROM v_alert, vars
WHERE
  start_time BETWEEN $__timeFrom()::timestamptz - v_offset
  AND
  $__timeTo()::timestamptz - v_offset
  AND
  /* SharedFilter - START v20220915 */
  managed_object_name IN ($Managed_Object) AND
  NOT managed_object_name = Any(ARRAY[$Managed_Object_exclude]::text[]) AND
  importance_txt IN ($Severity_Level) AND
  alert_type_txt IN ($Alert_Type) AND
  direction IN ($Direction) AND
  impact_bps >= (coalesce(nullif('$min_impact_gbps', ''), '0')::double precision * 1000 * 1000 * 1000) AND
  INITCAP(mitigated::text) IN ($Mitigated) AND
  ARRAY[$Mitigation_Type] && mitigation_types AND
  INITCAP(automitigation::text) IN ($Automitigation)
  /* SharedFilter - END */
)

SELECT "ANY Bytes", "ANY Packets", "TMS Bytes", "TMS Packets", "Flowspec Bytes", "Flowspec Packets", "Blackhole Bytes", "Blackhole Packets",
COALESCE((("ANY Bytes"::float/NULLIF("ANY Bytes (prev)",0))*100), 0)::int as "ANY Bytes %",
COALESCE((("ANY Packets"::float/NULLIF("ANY Packets (prev)",0))*100), 0)::int as "ANY Packets %",

COALESCE((("TMS Bytes"::float/NULLIF("TMS Bytes (prev)",0))*100), 0)::int as "TMS Bytes %",
COALESCE((("TMS Packets"::float/NULLIF("TMS Packets (prev)",0))*100), 0)::int as "TMS Packets %",

COALESCE((("Flowspec Bytes"::float/NULLIF("Flowspec Bytes (prev)",0))*100), 0)::int as "Flowspec Bytes %",
COALESCE((("Flowspec Packets"::float/NULLIF("Flowspec Packets (prev)",0))*100), 0)::int as "Flowspec Packets %",

COALESCE((("Blackhole Bytes"::float/NULLIF("Blackhole Bytes (prev)",0))*100), 0)::int as "Blackhole Bytes %",
COALESCE((("Blackhole Packets"::float/NULLIF("Blackhole Packets (prev)",0))*100), 0)::int as "Blackhole Packets %",

"ANY Bytes (prev)", "ANY Packets (prev)", "TMS Bytes (prev)", "TMS Packets (prev)", "Flowspec Bytes (prev)", "Flowspec Packets (prev)", "Blackhole Bytes (prev)", "Blackhole Packets (prev)"
from SET1, SET2
